isDatabaseAuditColumnsCreated.description: This will create columns to log the UTC datetime and userid of the record add or the last record update

isInternalObjectApiCreated.description: This will create an object api for internal use

databaseTableNamePrefix.description: Any default prefix which required to add with table name set here, default its blank

suppressUsingDatabaseDeclarationInScript.description: Default its false, Use for decide having Use [DBName] in intial of each script file or not

suppressFillObjLookupTableScripts.description: Prevents creation of some sql scripts in case when project doesn't have tables

isValidationMissesLogged.description: Use to decide either validations failure need to write in logs or not

items.description: Objects that modify the model automatically
Item that defines the lexicon of the namespace

internalTextValue.description: Internal calculated text that is best guess for dispaly text

items.description: Item that defines a user story in the namespace

isIgnored.description: will be ignored by the code generator array loop

name.description: Name of object like Tac, Country, EmailMarketingPlatform etc...

isLookup.description: Determines generation of functionality i.e. lookup by ID

parentObjectName.description: In the object heriarchy, who is its parent. An object cannot have more than one parent.

items.description: Objects that modify the model automatically

isImported.description: Has the package been imported into the model already?

isSubscriptionAllowed.description: Is a subscription to the model package allowed?

isSubscribed.description: Are changes to the model package in the future automatically imported

role.description: Role that uses the package pages

lookupItem.description: Array of items in a lookup object

childObject.description: Array of child objects to generate

prop.description: Array of Specified elements like: name, sqlserverDataType, sqlServerDBDataTypeSize, isFK

sqlServerDBDataTypeSize.description: (Size of nvarchar) . 100 by default for nvarchar

isFK.description: (Defines if the prop is a foreign key; if true provide additional prop "fkObjectName" to specify FK entity)

isFKConstraintSuppressed.description: Do not add a constraint on th database. Some fk ID properties will not always have a value set.

fKObjectName.description: Name of lookup i.e. foreign key object target, Like Flavor, Customer etc...

fKObjectPropertyName.description: Name of lookup property i.e. foregin key field name

isFKLookup.description: Defines if param is a lookup key

labelText.description: Label text usually use to specify text of label where checkbox or some related label text need to be place

isNotPublishedToSubscriptions.description: If true, the prop will not be sent to any prop subscribers.

isQueryByAvailable.description: If true, the db column will be indexed, and a query by function will be created

propSubscription.description: Array of subscribers to this objects props

destinationContextObjectName.description: The name of the object that owns the destinationTargetName

destinationTargetName.description: Destination objwf or report that is the subscriber

isIgnored.description: will be ignored by the code generator array loop

calculatedProp.description: Array of Calculated elements like: name, calculatedCSharpDataType, calculatedSqlServerDefaultValue, isFK

sqlServerDBDataTypeSize.description: (Size of nvarchar) . 100 by default for nvarchar

name.description: Name of report file that codegenerator needs to create for this object

isCachingAllowed.description: Are the report results allowed to be cached?

isButtonDropDownAllowed.description: Are dropdown display of buttons allowed, instead of display of individual buttons. for grid viz.

isCustomSqlUsed.description: Is custom sql stored proc used for the report?

ratingLevelColumnName.description: Rating Level Column Name Override  Calculated Default to RatingLevel.

targetChildObject.description: Child object of the owner object that is displayed on the report

isRatingLevelChangingRowBackgroundColor.description: A column can return rating levels of Unknown,Excellent,Good,Fair, or Poor. They can change the color of the row automatically to normal,green, light green, yellow,red.

cacheExpirationInMinutes.description: Number of minutes till the report result cache expires

isPagingAvailable.description: Determins whether to show paging or not

isFilterSectionHidden.description: Determins to show filter or not

isFilterSectionCollapsable.description: Determines if expand/collapse button is shown at top right corner

isAzureBlobStorageUsed.description: Is the data source an azure storage blob? If so, use its data provider

isAzureTableUsed.description: Is the data source an azure storage table? If so, use its data provider

azureTablePrimaryKeyColumn.description: What column is used for the azure storage table rowkey value?

isAzureTablePrimaryKeyColumnDateTime.description: Is the column a datetime? If so, it affects the format of the rowkey value.

reportButton.description: Array of buttons display on reports

buttonType.description: back button is top left, add button is top right, Other button is in top right. multiSelectProcessing button is above reprot list to process ismulitiselectcolumn=true column

isVisible.description: Determine need to visible or not

isEnabled.description: Is user allowed to click button?

isButtonCallToAction.description: Show button as call to action

isIgnored.description: will be ignored by the code generator array loop

conditionalVisiblePropertyName.description: If button is conditional depedant on third field

buttonBadgePropertyName.description: init property containing data to be displayed in button badge

buttonTypeDisplayOrder.description: display order of button of same type

buttonText.description: Text display on button like 'Add A Flavor'

buttonName.description: Optional name of button. Neccesary for multiple multiselect buttons

destinationContextObjectName.description: The name of the object that owns the destinationTargetName

destinationTargetName.description: Destination defined by user role. Means objwf or report that the user should be sent to

name.description: Name of field, use to creates field in Farm -> ManualWeb -> Pages -> Report -> LandPlantList.cshtml.cs

sqlServerDBDataTypeSize.description: (Size of nvarchar) . 100 by default for nvarchar

fKObjectName.description: Name of lookup i.e. foreign key object target

isFKLookup.description: Defines if param is a lookup key

isFKList.description: Defines if dropdown list should be shown

targetColumnName.description: Which column does this filter primarily apply to?

reportColumn.description: Defines elements in a column in a report page, including simple text or flow buttons

name.description: Reference/display name, should match db field name

sourceLookupObjImplementationObjName.description: If the sources object name is a lookup, this is the name of the object that is implementing the lookup.  example would be Customer for source object state on customer.stateid

infoToolTipText.description: Display a blue i with hover text next to the column name

sqlServerDBDataTypeSize.description: (Size of nvarchar) . 100 by default for nvarchar

isButton.description: Spedify column is button column or just text column

isButtonCallToAction.description: Show button as call to action

isSummaryDisplayed.description: Display a vaue in summary row?

isConditionallyDisplayed.description: The column may or may not be displayed, depending on anohter columns value.

isFilterAvailable.description: The column should have a filter control.

conditionalSqlLogic.description: if logic evaluates to true, the bit column will be true

isUnixEpochDateTime.description: Is this long data tye coumn really a unix epoch datetime? If so, should be displayed as a datetime

buttonText.description: Text of button, only applicable if column isButton column = true

destinationContextObjectName.description: The name of the object that owns the destinationTargetName

destinationTargetName.description: objwf or report that the user should be sent to

isNavURL.description: Determine if its a column with a link

NavURLLinkText.description: Text display for navigation link column

isButtonClickedOnRowClick.description: Row click should also trigger button click or not

isAsyncObjWFResultFileStreamedOut.description: Async obj wf result file should be sreamed out

headerText.description: Column header text or column title

isIgnored.description: will be ignored by the code generator array loop

name.description: Workflow ID, unique for each workflow element

initObjectWorkflowName.description: Workflow name "Like UpdateFlavorInitObjWF (Used for Flows .cs file names)"

isInitObjWFSubscribedToParams.description: Are the init obj wf output vars auto generated by the params of this one?

isExposedInBusinessObject.description: Defines access to business logic functionality

isObjectDelete.description: Is this deleting the owner object?

targetChildObject.description: Child object of the owner object that is being added

infoToolTipText.description: Display a blue i with hover text next to the param label

sqlServerDBDataTypeSize.description: (Size of nvarchar) . 100 by default for nvarchar

isAutoCompleteAddressSource.description: Implements typical google address auto complete

autoCompleteAddressSourceName.description: This should be a typical address field with typical address line, city, state, or zip label. Source would have isAutoCompleteAddressSource set to true.

isIgnored.description: will be ignored by the code generator array loop

sqlServerDBDataTypeSize.description: (Size of nvarchar) . 100 by default for nvarchar

isIgnored.description: will be ignored by the code generator array loop

isButtonCallToAction.description: Show button as call to action

fetch.description: Array of Calculated elements like: name, calculatedCSharpDataType, calculatedSqlServerDefaultValue, isFK

query.description: Array of Calculated elements like: name, calculatedCSharpDataType, calculatedSqlServerDefaultValue, isFK

isCustomSqlUsed.description: Is custom sql stored proc used for the report?

intersectionObj.description: These are tables that are not in its parent child tree, but relevant as intersection to another tree branch

isFullResearchDatabaseViewAllowed.description: If true, also create a 'Detail' view that inculdes its data and all ancestor object heirarcy data.

isNotImplemented.description: If true, many items will not be generated. Its just for a sketch of an object.

name.description: Name of object like Flavor etc...

isPublic.description: Is an api key required in the header on each request?

apiLogReportName.description: report used for api logging. Lazy write required.

name.description: Environment of API like Development, Production etc..

isPublic.description: Is an api key required in the header on each endpoint request?

isLazyPost.description: All posts are processed asyncronously later. All responses return a success. Authorization is checked during processing.

pluralName.description: API End Point Name in plural form

apiGetInitContextTargetName.description: The name of the object init workflow.

apiGetInitContextObjectName.description: The name of the object for GetInit Method.

apiPostContextTargetName.description: The name of the object workflow.

apiPostWithIdResultFilePathParamName.description: The name of the object workflow.

apiPutContextObjectName.description: The name of the object for Put Method.

apiPutContextTargetName.description: The name of the object workflow for Put Method.

apiDeleteContextObjectName.description: The name of the object for Delete Method.

apiDeleteContextTargetName.description: The name of the object workflow for Delete Method.

roleRequired.description: Role required to see the navigation option

templateSet.description: Template sets selected to render in fabrication

name.description: Internal name of the template set

title.description: External title of the template set

version.description: Display version of the selected template set
